comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Chandler Parsons Anderson (1886-1936), American lawyer, international affairs specialist; in 1914-1919 he was advising the US Department of State and counsel for War Industries Board and the International Red Cross.  His papers are in the Library of Congress.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
pennylrichardsca,

Thanks for the additional info on Mr. Anderson and for pointing out that his papers are held at the Library of Congress by the Manuscript Division.  The connections between the collections of the various divisions of the Library are always helpful to note for researchers.
